content: 1 Blessed are the perfect in the way, who walk in the law of Jehovah.
content_old: 1 Blessed are the perfect in the way, who walk in the law of Jehovah.

content: 2 Blessed are they that observe his testimonies, that seek him with the whole heart;
content_old: 2 Blessed are they that observe his testimonies, that seek him with the whole heart;

content: 3 Who also do no unrighteousness: they walk in his ways.
content_old: 3 Who also do no unrighteousness: they walk in his ways.

content: 4 Thou hast enjoined thy precepts, to be kept diligently.
content_old: 4 Thou hast enjoined thy precepts, to be kept diligently.

content: 5 Oh that my ways were directed to keep thy statutes!
content_old: 5 Oh that my ways were directed to keep thy statutes!

content: 6 Then shall I not be ashamed, when I have respect unto all thy commandments.
content_old: 6 Then shall I not be ashamed, when I have respect unto all thy commandments.

content: 7 I will give thee thanks with uprightness of heart, when I shall have learned thy righteous judgments.
content_old: 7 I will give thee thanks with uprightness of heart, when I shall have learned thy righteous judgments.

content: 8 I will keep thy statutes: forsake me not utterly.
content_old: 8 I will keep thy statutes: forsake me not utterly.

content: 9 Wherewithal shall a young man cleanse his path? by taking heed according to thy word.
content_old: 9 Wherewithal shall a young man cleanse his path? by taking heed according to thy word.

content: 10 With my whole heart have I sought thee: let me not wander from thy commandments.
content_old: 10 With my whole heart have I sought thee: let me not wander from thy commandments.

content: 11 Thy •word have I hid in my heart, that I might not sin against thee.
content_old: 11 Thy •word have I hid in my heart, that I might not sin against thee.

content: 12 Blessed art thou, Jehovah! teach me thy statutes.
content_old: 12 Blessed art thou, Jehovah! teach me thy statutes.

content: 13 With my lips have I declared all the judgments of thy mouth.
content_old: 13 With my lips have I declared all the judgments of thy mouth.

content: 14 I have rejoiced in the way of thy testimonies, as much as in all wealth.
content_old: 14 I have rejoiced in the way of thy testimonies, as much as in all wealth.

content: 15 I will meditate upon thy precepts, and have respect unto thy paths.
content_old: 15 I will meditate upon thy precepts, and have respect unto thy paths.

content: 16 I delight myself in thy statutes; I will not forget thy word.
content_old: 16 I delight myself in thy statutes; I will not forget thy word.

content: 17 Deal bountifully with thy servant and I shall live; and I will keep thy word.
content_old: 17 Deal bountifully with thy servant and I shall live; and I will keep thy word.

content: 18 Open mine eyes, and I shall behold wondrous things out of thy law.
content_old: 18 Open mine eyes, and I shall behold wondrous things out of thy law.

content: 19 I am a stranger in the land; hide not thy commandments from me.
content_old: 19 I am a stranger in the land; hide not thy commandments from me.

content: 20 My soul breaketh for longing after thy judgments at all times.
content_old: 20 My soul breaketh for longing after thy judgments at all times.

content: 21 Thou hast rebuked the proud that are cursed, who wander from thy commandments.
content_old: 21 Thou hast rebuked the proud that are cursed, who wander from thy commandments.

content: 22 Roll off from me reproach and contempt; for I observe thy testimonies.
content_old: 22 Roll off from me reproach and contempt; for I observe thy testimonies.

content: 23 Princes also did sit and talk together against me: thy servant doth meditate in thy statutes.
content_old: 23 Princes also did sit and talk together against me: thy servant doth meditate in thy statutes.

content: 24 Thy testimonies also are my delight and my counsellors.
content_old: 24 Thy testimonies also are my delight and my counsellors.

content: 25 My soul cleaveth unto the dust: quicken me according to thy word.
content_old: 25 My soul cleaveth unto the dust: quicken me according to thy word.

content: 26 I have declared my ways, and thou hast answered me: teach me thy statutes.
content_old: 26 I have declared my ways, and thou hast answered me: teach me thy statutes.

content: 27 Make me to understand the way of thy precepts, and I will meditate upon thy wondrous works.
content_old: 27 Make me to understand the way of thy precepts, and I will meditate upon thy wondrous works.

content: 28 My soul melteth for sadness: strengthen me according to thy word.
content_old: 28 My soul melteth for sadness: strengthen me according to thy word.

content: 29 Remove from me the way of falsehood, and graciously grant me thy law.
content_old: 29 Remove from me the way of falsehood, and graciously grant me thy law.

content_old: 30 I have chosen the way of faithfulness; thy judgments have I set before me.

content: 31 I cleave unto thy testimonies; Jehovah, let me not be ashamed.
content_old: 31 I cleave unto thy testimonies; Jehovah, let me not be ashamed.

content: 32 I will run the way of thy commandments when thou shalt enlarge my heart.
content_old: 32 I will run the way of thy commandments when thou shalt enlarge my heart.

content: 33 Teach me, O Jehovah, the way of thy statutes, and I will observe it unto the end.
content_old: 33 Teach me, O Jehovah, the way of thy statutes, and I will observe it unto the end.

content: 34 Give me understanding, and I will observe thy law; and I will keep it with my whole heart.
content_old: 34 Give me understanding, and I will observe thy law; and I will keep it with my whole heart.

content: 35 Make me to walk in the path of thy commandments; for therein do I delight.
content_old: 35 Make me to walk in the path of thy commandments; for therein do I delight.

content: 36 Incline my heart unto thy testimonies, and not to gain.
content_old: 36 Incline my heart unto thy testimonies, and not to gain.

content: 37 Turn away mine eyes from beholding vanity; quicken me in thy way.
content_old: 37 Turn away mine eyes from beholding vanity; quicken me in thy way.

content: 38 Establish thy •word unto thy servant, who is devoted to thy fear.
content_old: 38 Establish thy •word unto thy servant, who is devoted to thy fear.

content: 39 Turn away my reproach which I fear; for thy judgments are good.
content_old: 39 Turn away my reproach which I fear; for thy judgments are good.

content_old: 40 Behold, I have longed after thy precepts: quicken me in thy righteousness.

content_old: 42 So shall I have wherewith to answer him that reproacheth me; for I confide in thy word.

content_old: 43 And take not the word of truth utterly out of my mouth; because I have hoped in thy judgments.

content_old: 44 Then will I keep thy law continually, for ever and ever;

content_old: 45 And I will walk at liberty, for I have sought thy precepts;

content_old: 46 And I will speak of thy testimonies before kings, and will not be ashamed;

content_old: 47 And I will delight myself in thy commandments, which I have loved;

content_old: 48 And I will lift up my hands unto thy commandments, which I have loved, and I will meditate in thy statutes.

content: 49 Remember the word for thy servant, upon which thou hast caused me to hope.
content_old: 49 Remember the word for thy servant, upon which thou hast caused me to hope.

content_old: 50 This is my comfort in mine affliction; for thy •word hath quickened me.

content_old: 51 The proud have derided me beyond measure: I have not declined from thy law.

content_old: 54 Thy statutes have been my songs in the house of my pilgrimage.

content_old: 55 I have remembered thy name, O Jehovah, in the night, and have kept thy law.

content_old: 59 I have thought on my ways, and turned my feet unto thy testimonies.

content: 60 I have made haste, and not delayed, to keep thy commandments.

content_old: 65 Thou hast dealt well with thy servant, O Jehovah, according to thy word.

content: 67 Before I was afflicted I went astray, but now I keep thy •word.

content: 70 Their heart is as fat as grease: as for me, I delight in thy law.

content: 71 It is good for me that I have been afflicted, that I might learn thy statutes.
